title: Birth Of A Nation Starring Nat Turner...Not Nate Parker
itunes:title: Birth Of A Nation Starring Nat Turner...Not Nate Parker
description:
THU 10/6 - Nate Parker joins The Breakfast Club on the eve of the release of his new film "Birth of a Nation". Lots of controversy surrounding the man behind the movement but we dive in and discuss the importance of the film measured against the character of its creator. Grown folk talk right here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
